definition: burdened psychologically or mentally, fill or place a load on
details:
adjective
- burdened psychologically or mentally
= example: burdened psychologically or mentally
= synonyms: oppressed
- filled with a great quantity
= synonyms: loaded
verb
- fill or place a load on
= synonyms: load, lade, load up
- remove with or as if with a ladle
= synonyms: ladle, lade
